summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.4°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6759 lux) and cloud levels (up 290 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1870 m), light levels (up 12259 lux), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
